snippet.title: Pan Pan reveal trailer
snippet.description:
Visit Pan-Pan on steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/471920?beta=0
Developed by Spelkraft and published by Might and Delight. Pan-Pan is an open plain adventure that expands on the concept of environmental narrative storytelling with puzzle solving and exploration elements at its core.
